瞯字的基本解释

瞯
xián
眼睛斜视；眼睛上视，露出白眼。
眼病。
癫痫病。
英武奋勇的样子。
姓。

瞯
jiàn
　ㄐㄧㄢˋ
窥视：“吾将瞯良人之所之也。”
视，看。

瞯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xián］
［《廣韻》户閒切，平山，匣。］
(1)目上视，露白眼。
(2)马一目毛色白。
(3)小儿痫病。
(4)英武奋勇貌；自得貌。参见“瞯然”。
(5)姓。汉有瞯氏。见《史记·酷吏列传》。
[②]［jiàn］
［《集韻》居莧切，去襇，見。］
窥视；侦伺。

瞯字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　瞯； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页817第31
【唐韻】戸閒切【集韻】【韻會】何閒切【正韻】何艱切，?音閑。【說文】戴目也。【徐曰】謂目望陽也。【揚子·方言】眄也，吳揚江淮之閒或曰瞯。　又【廣韻】人目多白也。　又【爾雅·釋畜疏】馬一目白者名瞯。【張協·七命】天驥之駿，眸瞯黑照。【註】瞯，馬目也。【說文】作?。　又【漢書·音義】瞯，小兒癇病也。　又姓。【史記·酷吏傳】濟南瞯氏。　又【集韻】居莧切【韻會】居諫切【正韻】居晏切，?閒去聲。視也。又覘也。【孟子】王使人瞯夫子。【宋史·鎭王竑傳】丞相史彌遠，使美人瞯竑，動息必以告。　【集韻】同覸。【正字通】與瞰闞矙???通。

瞯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瞯字的起名意思

暂无。

Squint
Basic explanation of words
Squint
xián
The eyes are squinted; the eyes look upward, revealing white eyes.
Eye disease.
Epilepsy.
The look of heroism and courage.
name.
Squint
jiàn
ㄐ ㄧ ㄢ
Peeping: "I will look at the place of my beloved."
See, see.
Squint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xián］
["Guangyun" household leisure cutting, Pingshan, Xie. ]
(1) Look up and show your eyes.
(2) The horse's hair color is white.
(3) Epilepsy in children.
(4) Heroic appearance; self-satisfied appearance. See "Liu Ran".
(5) Last name. There is the Luo family in Han. See "Historical Records · Biography of Cool Officials".
[②]［jiàn］
["Jiyun" is in the cut, go to the bust, see. ]
Peep;
Squint
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Headword Department] 　瞯; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 817 31
[Tang Yun] Xian cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] He Xian cut [Zheng Yun] How difficult is it to cut? Sound free. [Said the text] Wearing eyes also. [Xu Yue] It is said that the eyes are looking at the sun. 【Yangtze Dialect】Xuan Ye, Wu Yang Jianghuai's leisure time is called Liao.　[Guangyun] The eyes are so white.　[Erya·Shikushu] The name of Ma Yimebai. [Zhang Xie·Seven Lives] The horse of Tianji, with black eyes. 【Note】Lie, horse eye also. [Said the text] For?.　[Hanshu·Synonyms] 瞯, there is also epilepsy in children.　Another last name. 【Historical Records·The Biography of Cool Officials】Jinan's Luo family.　[Ji Yun] Ju Lingqie [Rhyme Club] Ju Jianqie [Zheng Yun] Ju Yanqie, go freely. See also. Also Zang Ye. [Mencius] Wang made people look at the master. [Song History·The Biography of King Jun] The history of the prime minister is far away, so that the beauties can be stunned, and they must be told when they move and rest.　【Jiyun】Same as you. [Zhengzitong] is connected with Kan Kan Kan???.

Squint
Name meaning
Nothing.
xián, jiàn
I xián сущ.
глаз с вывернутыми белками; вывернутые (крупные) белки (глаз, напр. лошади)
II jiàn гл.
высматривать, подсматривать, подглядывать
III xián собств.
Сянь (фамилия)
